categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars drafts

nodes.text: The Sice system was a star system that contained the planet Sicemon, a grassy world that was home to a Rebel Alliance base.

The Sice system appeared in the rough draft of Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi as the location where Millennium Falcon traveled following the rescue of Han Solo to regroup with the Rebel Alliance at their base on Sicemon. However, the world and its system were not present in the final version of the film, and the Falcon instead rendezvoused with the Alliance Fleet near Sullust.
